attributes.action: make prisoners work for food and lodgings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why shoud the taxpayer have to fund lawbreakers. i suggest making them work for a decent meal, if they refuse give them bread and water, tv, phone calls and leisure activities should be worked for and not given freely.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
